title: Lower East Side Tenement Museum National Historic Site: Permits & Reservations
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Permits & Reservations              Permits & Reservations       Located in the heart of New York City's diverse Lower East Side, the Tenement Museum is a unique space, perfect for your next event. Host your reception In the new Sadie Samuelson Levy Immigrant Heritage Center and complete the evening with an educator-led tour of our historic tenement at 97 Orchard Street. Follow this link to learn how to hold a private event at the Museum.
